# Rooftop Strider (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 1]], [[City (Domain)|City 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a chip of roof tile)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Races of Destiny (WotC), pg. 167

You can run across rooftops or similar uneven surfaces much more easily than normal. You gain a +5 competence bonus on [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] (v3.5 Balance and Jump) checks. You automatically succeed on all Jump checks to clear a horizontal distance of 5 feet or less. You do not need to make Balance checks for running or charging across a sloped surface.
